project_intro.title: Enduroom UEM Forum
project_intro.description: The UEM forum support website has been enhanced to foster community engagement and collaboration among users. It now features badges, leaderboards, discussion threads, ideation spaces, groups, and tags, creating a more interactive and user-friendly platform for IT professionals to connect and share knowledge.

details.title: Context
details.description: The objective of this case study is to elevate the UEM forums by addressing existing limitations and introducing new features that promote active participation, streamline communication, and foster a stronger sense of community among users. The aim is to create an engaging platform where IT professionals can easily exchange knowledge, collaborate on ideas, and build connections within the UEM ecosystem. By implementing features like badges, leaderboards, enhanced discussions, ideation spaces, groups, and tags, the redesign seeks to make the forums more interactive, user-friendly, and conducive to both learning and innovation.

content.title: Issues faced in the current forums
issue_faced: Absence of structured Discussions and Community Participation

key_improve.title: Badges
key_improve.description: A badge system has been implemented to reward active participation and contributions. Users can earn badges for achievements like posting helpful answers, starting popular discussions, or contributing innovative ideas, adding a gamified element to the forum experience.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Leaderboards
key_improve.description: To motivate users and highlight top contributors, leaderboards have been added. These display rankings based on metrics such as the number of posts, likes received, and badges earned, promoting healthy competition within the community.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Discussions
key_improve.description: The discussion section has been enhanced to facilitate more meaningful and organized conversations. Users can now easily start, follow, and contribute to threads, with improved threading and notification features to keep discussions active and engaging.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Ideation
key_improve.description: A dedicated ideation space allows users to propose new ideas, share feedback, and collaborate on solutions. This feature encourages innovation by giving users a platform to influence product development and share creative concepts.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Groups
key_improve.description: To better organize discussions and create focused communities, a groups feature has been introduced. Users can join or create groups based on specific interests, roles, or topics, allowing for more targeted discussions and networking opportunities.
key_improve.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none'><path d='M4 12H20M20 12L14 6M20 12L14 18' stroke='#181818' stroke-width='1.5' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>

key_improve.title: Tags
key_improve.description: A tagging system has been implemented to improve content discoverability. Users can tag posts with relevant keywords, making it easier to find and categorize information across the forums.

refreshed_designs.title: Refreshed Designs
refreshed_designs.final_outcome: These enhancements have transformed the UEM forums into a more vibrant and interactive platform, fostering greater user participation and collaboration. The addition of gamification elements like badges and leaderboards, combined with organized discussions, ideation spaces, groups, and tags, has significantly improved the user experience and engagement within the community.

designs.title: Custom feeds
designs.description: The forum's home page has been refreshed with a modern design and is now packed with new features like custom feeds where the users can curate the content based on their likes and following providing users with a more engaging and intuitive experience right from the start.

designs.title: Enhanced Engagement Factors
designs.description: Gamification elements, including badges and leaderboards, have been introduced to the forums to encourage active participation and create a more engaging user experience.

designs.title: Enhanced Networking Factors
designs.description: Groups and events have been integrated into the forums, allowing users to connect around shared interests and participate in community-driven activities, further enhancing collaboration and engagement.

designs.title: Enhanced Topics
designs.description: Discussions and ideations have been added to the forums, enabling users to engage in in-depth conversations and propose new ideas, fostering a more interactive and innovative community environment.

designs.title: Micro Improvements
designs.description: The tables have been redesigned to handle more data efficiently, with a better format and responsive design for an improved user experience across all devices.
